abstract: A dictionary of audio resources with user-defined names.
overview:
## Discussion

The values can be any [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioResource] type, such as [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioFileResource] or [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioFileGroupResource]. In memory, you can also use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioBufferResource], but this type doesn’t support serializing to disk or sharing via network.

# resources

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of audio resources with user-defined names.

## Declaration

```swift
var resources: [String : AudioResource]
```

## Discussion

The values can be any [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioResource] type, such as [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioFileResource] or [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioFileGroupResource]. In memory, you can also use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioBufferResource], but this type doesn’t support serializing to disk or sharing via network.
title: resources
